summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account during September 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $1,000,000. The document is marked confidential and is part of a larger investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, which details his account activities.

events.title: Account Activity Summary
events.description: Summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for September 2016.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: A significant outgoing money transfer of $1,000,000 from Jeffrey Epstein's account to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

locations: 6100 Red 14ook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank, showing a beginning balance of $9,799.94 and an ending balance of $9,799.94 after transactions.
A total deposit of $1,000,000.00 was made into Epstein's account on September 6, 2016.
An outgoing transfer of $1,000,000.00 was made from Epstein's account to JPMorgan Chase Bank on the same date.
The document includes service charges and fees totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of a larger investigation under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
